attributes.action: Hold a referendum on rejoining the European Union
attributes.additional_details: The government rightly delivered the will of the British people based upon the vote on leaving the EU. But the British people were misled, maybe even lied to about how the economy would be better off, the NHS would be better off and immigration would be all but stopped! The truth is, the economy is collapsing, the NHS has never been in such a poor state and immigrants are being given free hotels, meals and clothes! That isn’t what we voted for! We want back in and it’s about time we had a vote!
attributes.background: Hold a referendum and let the British people vote on wether to rejoin the European Union

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625314
